name: Shadow Harmony
desc2: The DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Aftershocks</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</ct> is increased by 15%.
desc4: Upon hitting an enemy with an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, if the DMG dealt aligns with the equipper's attribute, the equipper gains 1 stack of a buff effect, at most once per use of a skill. For each stack, the equipper's ATK increases by 4%, and CRIT Rate increases by 4%. The effect can stack up to 3 times and lasts for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
story: A mysterious Drive Disc that is highly talked about among Hollow Raiders. Its tracks seem to be "A Ballad Sung by Shadows." The author is unknown, but most believe in the theory that the author is not just one person.
